description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for unit testing purposes, which implements interfaces 'IShell' and 'IShell::ICOMLink' from the WPEFramework. It uses Google Mock ('gmock') to create mock methods for various functionalities of the services, such as retrieving system information, managing web servers, and handling connections.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the 'IShell' and 'IShell::ICOMLink' interfaces for testing purposes, created using Google Mock to simulate the behavior of service components in WPEFramework.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string or URL for the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign identifier for the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix URL.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns the configuration line for the service.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns the path to persistent storage.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns the path to volatile storage.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns the data storage path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature (by uint8_t code) is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with provided parameters.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns the subsystem interface.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with an identifier and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with given strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries for a connection interface by callsign.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification object.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification object.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model identifier string.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service runs in the background.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns the accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path to the proxy stub.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns a hash key string.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs substitution based on the input string.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the current reason code for a state.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns system root path string.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns system path string.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns plugin path string.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Gets the start mode of the service.

methods.name: StartMode (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets the start mode with an input parameter.

methods.name: Resumed (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets the resumed state.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Retrieves metadata (e.g., JSON or other info).

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernate the service with a reason code.

methods.name: RemoteConnection
methods.description: Returns the remote connection object for a given ID.
